verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> to the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G3739>(Which<s%> he had <S%G4279>promised<s%> <S%G4279>before<s%> by his <S%G4396>prophets<s%> in the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1124>scriptures,<s%>)

<S%G4012>Concerning<s%> his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> of the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%>

And <S%G3724>declared<s%> to be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G42>holiness,<s%> by the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead:<s%>

By <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G651>apostleship,<s%> for <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> for his <S%G3686>name:<s%>
<S%G1722>Among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are you <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G2822>called<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

To <S%G3956>all<s%> that be in <S%G4516>Rome,<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G4412>First,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for you <S%G3956>all,<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2605>spoken<s%> of <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> is my <S%G3144>witness,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> with my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> in the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that <S%G89>without<s%> <S%G89>ceasing<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you <S%G3842>always<s%> in my <S%G4335>prayers;<s%>

<S%G1189>Making<s%> <S%G1189>request,<s%> <S%G1513>if<s%> by <S%G4458>any<s%> <S%G4458>means<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4218>at<s%> <S%G4218>length<s%> I might have a <S%G2137>prosperous<s%> <S%G2137>journey<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you.

For I <S%G1971>long<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> you, that I may <S%G3330>impart<s%> to you <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift,<s%> to the <S%G1519>end<s%> you may be <S%G4741>established;<s%>
That is, that I may be <S%G4837>comforted<s%> <S%G4837>together<s%> with you by the <S%G1722>mutual<s%> <S%G240><s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of you and me.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> not have you <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that <S%G4178>oftentimes<s%> I <S%G4388>purposed<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, (but was <S%G2967>let<s%> till <S%G891>now,<s%> <S%G1204><s%>) that I might <S%G2192>hav<s%>e <S%G5100>som<s%>e <S%G2590>frui<s%>t <S%G1722>amon<s%>g you <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2532>eve<s%>n as <S%G1722>amon<s%>g <S%G3062>othe<s%>r <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>
I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3781>debtor<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> and to the <S%G915>Barbarians;<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> and to the <S%G453>unwise.<s%>
<S%G3779>So,<s%> as <S%G2596>much<s%> as in me is, I am <S%G4289>ready<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you that are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

For I am not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> for it is the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G4100>believes;<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

For <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> is the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> from <S%G4102>faith<s%> to <S%G4102>faith:<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> The <S%G1342>just<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> and <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2722>hold<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> in <S%G93>unrighteousness;<s%>
<S%G1360>Because<s%> that which may be <S%G1110>known<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in them; for <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5319>showed<s%> it to them.

For the <S%G517>invisible<s%> things of him from the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> are <S%G2529>clearly<s%> <S%G2529>seen,<s%> being <S%G3539>understood<s%> by the things that are <S%G4161>made,<s%> even his <S%G126>eternal<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G2305>Godhead;<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that they are <S%G379>without<s%> <S%G379>excuse:<s%>

<S%G1360>Because<s%> that, when they <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> him not as <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>neither<s%> were <S%G2168>thankful;<s%> but <S%G3154>became<s%> <S%G3154>vain<s%> in their <S%G1261>imaginations,<s%> and their <S%G801>foolish<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened.<s%>
<S%G5335>Professing<s%> themselves to be <S%G4680>wise,<s%> they <S%G3471>became<s%> <S%G3471>fools,<s%>

And <S%G236>changed<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G862>incorruptible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> an <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G4161>made<s%> <S%G3667>like<s%> to <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> and to <S%G4071>birds,<s%> and four <S%G5074>footed<s%> <S%G5074>beasts,<s%> and <S%G2062>creeping<s%> things.

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> them up to <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of their own <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> to <S%G818>dishonor<s%> their own <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G1722>between<s%> <S%G1438>themselves:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G3337>changed<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> a <S%G5579>lie,<s%> and <S%G4573>worshipped<s%> and <S%G3000>served<s%> the <S%G2937>creature<s%> <S%G3844>more<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G2936>Creator,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G2128>blessed<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> them up to <S%G819>vile<s%> <S%G3806>affections:<s%> for <S%G5037>even<s%> their <S%G2338>women<s%> did <S%G3337>change<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that which is <S%G3844>against<s%> <S%G5449>nature:<s%>

And <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G730>men,<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> of the <S%G2338>woman,<s%> <S%G1572>burned<s%> in their <S%G3715>lust<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> <S%G730>men<s%> with <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G2716>working<s%> that which is <S%G808>unseemly,<s%> and <S%G618>receiving<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves<s%> that <S%G489>recompense<s%> of their <S%G4106>error<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1163>meet.<s%>

And <S%G2531>even<s%> as they did not <S%G1381>like<s%> to <S%G2192>retain<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in their <S%G1922>knowledge,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> them <S%G3860>over<s%> to a <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are not <S%G2520>convenient;<s%>

Being <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G2549>maliciousness;<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G5408>murder,<s%> <S%G2054>debate,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G2550>malignity;<s%> <S%G5588>whisperers,<s%>

<S%G2637>Backbiters,<s%> <S%G2319>haters<s%> of <S%G2319>God,<s%> <S%G5197>despiteful,<s%> <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G213>boasters,<s%> <S%G2182>inventors<s%> of <S%G2556>evil<s%> things, <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%>
<S%G801>Without<s%> <S%G801>understanding,<s%> covenant <S%G802>breakers,<s%> <S%G794>without<s%> natural <S%G794>affection,<s%> <S%G786>implacable,<s%> <S%G415>unmerciful:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G1921>knowing<s%> the <S%G1345>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that they which <S%G4238>commit<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> things are <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> do the <S%G846>same,<s%> but <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4909>pleasure<s%> in them that <S%G4238>do<s%> them.
